cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with text classification, which is a subfield of natural language processing. Additionally, the paper proposes a new stopping method for active learning, which is a common technique used in machine learning for text classification. 

The paper could also belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) because it proposes a new method for active learning that can be applied with any base learner. 

Furthermore, the paper could be relevant to the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) because text classification is often used in information retrieval systems. 

The paper could also be relevant to the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) because it proposes a new method for improving the performance of machine learning models. 

Finally, the paper could be relevant to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) because the proposed stopping method could potentially be applied to image classification tasks as well.
